bio: Victor is Co-founder of Mobile Kinetics since 2011, in charge with leading the Android Development Team but also building cloud solutions and micro-services back-ends. He is also co-organizing Google Developer Groups in Bucharest. Starting March 2019, Victor become Google Cloud Certified - Professional Cloud Architect
